meanings.sent1: The yoginis gathered in the park for their morning yoga session.
meanings.sent2: Many yoginis enjoy practicing yoga to stay healthy and calm.
meanings.sent3: The yoginis giggled as they tried to balance in tree pose.
meanings.sent4: The group of yoginis moved gracefully like swans during their yoga class.
meanings.sent5: The image of the yoginis stretching in the sunrise was peaceful and serene.

meanings.sent1: She invited all the yoginis to join her for a special yoga retreat.
meanings.sent2: The yoginis traveled from different cities to attend the yoga workshop.
meanings.sent3: The yoginis' colorful mats brightened up the yoga studio.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with flowers, just like the yoginis at the yoga festival.
meanings.sent5: The yoginis' dedication to their practice inspired others to join them.
